title: Connecting bug?
body: Mmk i have 20 minute waigs cause of bugsplat but thats not the issuie here. I downloaded LoL on one of my other laptops which took 3hours -_-. And i cant even play it? Dafuq man i get 100% on the loading screen and it wouldnt go to the fucking game and i cant tab out and even alt f4 out wtf man

replies.body: It sounds like your installation may not have been completed properly or outdated drivers that are causing bugsplats.  I suggest using the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up and get back in game.  Do these in custom games to be sure and prevent further penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
